description:
Subaru gets worried when his partner Thomas is reprimanded for being too violent while apprehending a robber.
Source: netflix

titles.title: Gaiken Dakede wa Nakami o Handan Dekinai
You Can`t Judge a Book by It`s Cover.
You can`t judge a book by its cover. 外見だけでは中身を判断できない
Не суди о книге по ее обложке
